com.zerog.ia.api.pub
Interface VariableAccess

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomCodeConsoleProxy, CustomCodePanelProxy, CustomCodeRuleProxy, InstallerProxy, UninstallerProxy
public interface VariableAccess

Method Summary
 Object getVariable(String var)
          Returns the value of the named variable.
 Object setVariable(String var, Object value)
          Sets the named variable to to refer to the value.
 String substitute(String var)
          Returns the fully resolved value of the named variable.
 

Method Detail

getVariable

public Object getVariable(String var)
Returns the value of the named variable. If no variable is defined for that name, returns null.

substitute

public String substitute(String var)
Returns the fully resolved value of the named variable. If no variable is defined for that name, returns "". Calls toString on non-string objects.

setVariable

public Object setVariable(String var,
                          Object value)
Sets the named variable to to refer to the value. If the variable was already set, its previous value is returned. Otherwise, returns null.
